function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased pedestrian and cyclist activity in green areas during lockdown may lead to higher risk of contagious disease transmission.","Impact":"Potential for increased spread of contagious diseases in densely populated green spaces.","Mitigation":"Implementing strict social distancing measures in green areas and promoting the use of face masks for pedestrians and cyclists.","Technologies":"Geofencing technology to monitor and enforce social distancing, and wearable technology for contact tracing.","People":"Pedestrians, cyclists, and other visitors to green areas.","Owner":"Local government authorities, park management organizations, and city planners."},{"Description":"Shift from work-related commutes to recreational cycling outside the more densely built city center may lead to higher risk of disease transmission in recreational areas.","Impact":"Higher concentration of people in recreational areas may increase the likelihood of disease spread.","Mitigation":"Encouraging staggered recreational activities to avoid overcrowding and promoting the use of online reservation systems for trail access.","Technologies":"Reservations and booking apps for trail access, and public health communication platforms for information dissemination.","People":"Recreational cyclists and visitors to green trails.","Owner":"City planners, trail management organizations, and public health authorities."}]}
